FOCUS LEVER SETTING

PUSH



OptionDescription
OFFPressing the center of the stick has no effect.
EDIT FOCUS AREAPress the center of the stick to choose the focus area size. If FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING or SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING is on, you can instead position the focus frame over the desired face, eye, animal, or object.
ZOOMPress the center of the stick to zoom in on the active focus area (□ 99).
RESET TO CENTERPress the center of the stick to select the center focus area.
Choose the functions performed by pressing the center of the
focus stick (focus lever) or by pressing the stick up, down, left, or
right.

OptionDescription
OFFPressing the stick up, down, left, or right has no effect.
DIRECT AF POINT SELECTIONChoose the focus area without leaving the shooting display.
EDIT FOCUS AREAPress the stick up, down, left, or right to view a focus-area display and choose the focus area.
TILT

# BUTTON/DIAL SETTING

# Access options for camera controls.

| To access control options, press MENU/OK, | I.Q. | BUTTON/DIAL SETTING 1 /3 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| select the / (SET UP) tab, and choose | AF | FOCUS LEVER SETTING ▶ |
| select the / (SET UP) tab, and choose | MF � | � EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU |
| BUTTON/DIAL SETTING. |  | 8 EDIT/SAVE QUICK MENU |
| BUTTON/DIAL SETTING. | 女 | FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING |
|  |  | POWER ZOOM LENS FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING |
| · | COMMAND DIAL SETTING - S.S OPERATION |  |
|  |  |  |
| 多 | COMMAND DIAL DIRECTION BACK EXIT |  |


FOCUS LEVER SETTING

Choose the functions performed by pressing the center of the
focus stick (focus lever) or by pressing the stick up, down, left, or
right.

PUSH

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| OFF | Pressing the center of the stick has no effect. |
| EDIT FOCUS AREA | Press the center of the stick to choose the focus area size. If FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING or SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING is on, you can instead position the focus frame over the desired face, eye, animal, or object. |
| ZOOM | Press the center of the stick to zoom in on the active focus area (□ 99). |
| RESET TO CENTER | Press the center of the stick to select the center focus area. |


TILT

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| OFF | Pressing the stick up, down, left, or right has no effect. |
| DIRECT AF POINT SELECTION | Choose the focus area without leaving the shooting display. |
| EDIT FOCUS AREA | Press the stick up, down, left, or right to view a focus-area display and choose the focus area. |

Choose the functions performed by pressing the center of the
focus stick (focus lever) or by pressing the stick up, down, left, or
right.

content.html:
OptionDescription
OFFPressing the center of the stick has no effect.
EDIT FOCUS AREAPress the center of the stick to choose the focus area size. If FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING or SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING is on, you can instead position the focus frame over the desired face, eye, animal, or object.
ZOOMPress the center of the stick to zoom in on the active focus area (□ 99).
RESET TO CENTERPress the center of the stick to select the center focus area.

| Option | Description |

| OFF | Pressing the center of the stick has no effect. |

| ZOOM | Press the center of the stick to zoom in on the active focus area (□ 99). |
| RESET TO CENTER | Press the center of the stick to select the center focus area. |
